title: A Serious Maid
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Kotori-chan, may I ask you for some advice?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Sure. What’s the matter?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I’m supposed to wear a maid outfit for my next magazine photoshoot.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Wow! You’re gonna look so cute in a maid outfit, Karin-san~! I’m gonna buy the magazine when it comes out! 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Thanks. I wanted to ask you how to act more like a maid since you work part-time as one.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Then why don’t you go see some maids at work? I have a shift today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>That sounds good. I think I’d have a better idea of what it’s like when a maid serves her customers. I’d be happy to be served by you, Kotori-chan. 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ehehe, I’ll do my very best to serve you. Ahem...... Now, young lady, give me your hand. I’ll take you to your destination.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Ko-Kotori-chan? You can start serving me when we get to the café.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I said I’d do my best to serve you. 𝅘𝅥𝅮 Come on, this way, my lady~ 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
